casebody.data:
William Preston CAHILL, Jr.
v.
Armand Alice Unkauf CAHILL NO. 2018-CC-0028 Supreme Court of Louisiana. February 23, 2018 Granted in part. The portion of the court of appeal's judgment holding relator, Armand Alice Unkauf Cahill, in contempt of court is reversed. In all other respects, the writ is denied. HUGHES, J., would deny.
